Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

 He smiled. "Trust me." He took a tool off his table and placed it in her ear 
shutting her down. "Kids these days they have no respect for thier elders." 
He Took off her head covering and looked inside. He could see the problem but 
getting to it was the problem. He hacked his way and removed the malfunctions 
circuit board. He placed it on the table and started reconnecting the the 
wires. He then copied the images he found onto a disc. He pieced together all 
the fragmented pictures into thier correct order by the date of the memory 
scenes.  He cleaned it up and transferred it back into the circuit board. If 
he put this is while she was asleep shed have a spark failure. So he set it 
up so they would come to her in a dream like state. He put it in and carried 
her to her quarters. He  turned her back on and she would awake when the 
dream memories came back to her completely. He walked away shaking his 
head.."A rough past that one...she'll be useful."

--part1_1a0.57ef0da.2a699ed4_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
